title: The Exchange: Laurence Boone
description:
The yellow vest protests are fizzling out in France, but the inequities that fueled them haven’t gone away. That it takes six generations for the poorest to reach the middle class is a big one. The OECD chief economist discusses this, Brexit, Italy and more with Rob Cox. 

 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
